mapper.select: SELECT daily_sales_code, statement_number, d.local_category_code, d.shop_code, s.shop_name, daily_sales_date, daily_sales_amount FROM daily_sales d INNER JOIN shop s ON d.local_category_code=s.local_category_code AND d.shop_code=s.shop_code ORDER BY daily_sales_code desc

SELECT monthly_sales_code, statement_number, m.local_category_code, m.shop_code, s.shop_name, monthly_sales_date, monthly_sales_amount, monthly_sales_moneydue FROM monthly_sales m INNER JOIN shop s ON m.local_category_code=s.local_category_code AND m.shop_code=s.shop_code ORDER BY monthly_sales_code desc

SELECT shop_name, daily_sales_amount FROM daily_sales d INNER JOIN shop s ON d.local_category_code=s.local_category_code AND d.shop_code=s.shop_code WHERE daily_sales_date='2017-10-19' ORDER BY daily_sales_amount desc LIMIT 5;

SELECT shop_name, monthly_sales_amount FROM monthly_sales m INNER JOIN shop s ON m.local_category_code=s.local_category_code AND m.shop_code=s.shop_code WHERE monthly_sales_date='2017-09-30' ORDER BY monthly_sales_amount desc LIMIT 5;

SELECT shop_name, daily_sales_date, daily_sales_amount FROM daily_sales d, shop s WHERE d.local_category_code=s.local_category_code AND d.shop_code=s.shop_code AND d.local_category_code=#{local} AND d.shop_code=#{shop} AND daily_sales_date BETWEEN '2017-12-04' AND '2017-12-10' ORDER BY daily_sales_code asc

SELECT s.shop_name, monthly_sales_date, monthly_sales_amount FROM monthly_sales m, shop s WHERE m.local_category_code=s.local_category_code AND m.shop_code=s.shop_code AND m.local_category_code=#{local} AND m.shop_code=#{shop} AND monthly_sales_date BETWEEN '2017-01-01' AND '2017-12-31' ORDER BY monthly_sales_code asc

SELECT fee_code, f.statement_number, shop_name, fee_month, fee_price, fee_autodate, fee_realdate, fee_remain FROM fee f, monthly_sales m, shop s WHERE f.monthly_sales_code=m.monthly_sales_code AND m.local_category_code=s.local_category_code AND m.shop_code=s.shop_code ORDER BY fee_code desc

SELECT fee_code, f.statement_number, shop_name, fee_month, fee_price, fee_autodate, fee_realdate, fee_remain FROM fee f, monthly_sales m, shop s WHERE f.monthly_sales_code=m.monthly_sales_code AND m.local_category_code=s.local_category_code AND m.shop_code=s.shop_code AND m.local_category_code=#{local} AND m.shop_code=#{shop} ORDER BY fee_code desc
